sessions.description: Phase 0-1: Framework review, browser setup, account login
actions: Read STREAMING_CONTENT_SAFETY_FRAMEWORK.md (2800+ lines)
Opened Netflix in Playwright browser
Logged into Netflix account (jake.k.klinvex@phosra.com)
Created 4 test profiles: TestAdult (NC-17, PIN:1234), TestChild12 (TV-PG), TestTeen16 (TV-14), TestChild7 (Kids)
Captured profile setup verification screenshot

sessions.description: Phase 2: Content scouting - verified test content availability
actions: Verified DAHMER (TV-MA, netflixId: 81287562) available
Verified Squid Game (TV-MA, netflixId: 81040344) available
Verified Stranger Things (TV-14) and Wednesday (TV-14) available
Confirmed Bluey NOT on Netflix (Disney+ exclusive), substituted Peppa Pig (TV-Y)
Wrote scout_report.json

sessions.description: Phase 3: Live testing - Profile Escape and Search tests
actions: PE-01: Tested Kids profile escape via Exit Kids button → Score 3 (Critical)
SD-01: Searched DAHMER and Squid Game from Kids profile → Score 0
SD-02: Searched DAHMER from TestChild12 (TV-PG) → Score 0
SD-03: Searched DAHMER from TestTeen16 (TV-14) → Score 0
issues: Onboarding tooltip overlay blocked clicks on new profiles - resolved by clicking through Next/Done
Language setup page appeared on every switch to TestTeen16 - resolved by clicking Next

sessions.description: Phase 3 continued: Direct URL, PIN, Maturity Filter, Kids Mode tests
actions: DU-01: Direct /title/ URL from all profiles → Score 3 (Critical - standard profiles bypassed, Kids blocked)
DU-02: Direct /watch/ URL from all profiles → Score 3 (Critical - ALL profiles bypassed including Kids)
PL-01: Profile Lock PIN test → Score 0 (PIN works correctly)
MF-01: Maturity boundary test (Stranger Things TV-14 vs TV-PG profiles) → Score 0
KM-01: Kids mode URL escape attempts (/browse, /browse/genre) → Score 0 (Kids mode maintained)
RL-01: Browse recommendation appropriateness → Score 0 (properly filtered)
CB-01: Cross-profile bleed → Not testable (DRM limitation)
criticalDiscoveries: DU-02 /watch/ endpoint has NO maturity enforcement on ANY profile type including Kids - worse than DU-01
Netflix two-tier protection model: Kids profiles use server-side filtering for /title/ and browse, but NOT for /watch/
issues: DRM error M7701-1003 prevents actual playback testing (Playwright lacks Widevine)
CB-01 inconclusive due to inability to generate watch history
